item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

i need help fixing this error anyone know what to do??

Player.java:1133: ')' expected if (output >=14000000 exp) ^ Player.java:1133: not a statement if (output >=14000000 exp) ^ Player.java:1133: ';' expected if (output >=14000000 exp) ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
This is what it looks like in the player.java

[code] }
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 99.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >=14000000 exp)
			return lvl99;
	}
	return 0;
}[/code]

So is anything wrong =/

Read full topic
